original_title: 14 arrested for assaulting youth to death in Dehiwala
original_body_lines: Police said that a total of 14 persons have been arrested over an incident of assaulting to death a 27-year-old person and seriously injuring another at an Air Conditioning repair centre in Dehiwala last night.
Police said that a lorry, a van and a three-wheeler have also been taken into custody over the incident.
The deceased has been identified as Dilshan Ranga Kumara, a 27-year-old resident of Badowita in Mount Lavinia.
